Plot: Three kids hire a low-budget bodyguard to protect them from the playground bully.
Title: Drillbit Taylor
Writer: Kristofor Brown (screenplay), Seth Rogen (screenplay), John Hughes (story), Kristofor Brown (story), Seth Rogen (story)
Actors: Nate Hartley, Troy Gentile, Ian Roberts, Owen Wilson
tomatoConsensus: Owen Wilson's charms can't save Drillbit Taylor, an unfunny, overly familiar bullied-teen comedy.
